scripts.import:document-types: npm run build && node dist/documentType.js --upsert --import data\documentType.jsonl
scripts.import:document-list: npm run build && node dist/documentList.js --upsert --import data\documentLists.jsonl
scripts.import:document-list-type: npm run build && node dist/documentListType.js --upsert --import data\documentLists.jsonl
scripts.import:document: npm run build && node dist/document.js --upsert --import data\documents.jsonl
scripts.clean:document: npm run build && node dist/document.js --upsert --import data\documents.jsonl
scripts.clean:document-list: npm run build && node dist/documentList.js  --clean data\documentLists.jsonl
